import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './SignUp.css'; import options from '../../Constants'; function SignUp() { const [user, setUser] = useState({ fname : "", lname : "", phn : "", email : "", username : "", password : "", cpassword : "", userType : "" }); let name, value; const handleInput = (e) => { console.log(e); name = e.target.name; value = e.target.value; setUser({...user, [name] : value}); } return (

Please fill in this form to create an account.

); } export default SignUp;
